noteLab.model.tool
Class Pen

java.lang.Object
  noteLab.model.tool.Pen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tool, CopyReady<Tool>, ModBroadcaster
public class Pen
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tool

This class represents a tool that is used to draw Strokes on a Page.

Author:
Dominic Kramer

Constructor Detail

Pen

public Pen(float scaleLevel)
Constructs a pen such that width of the lines drawn by this pen is the width after being scaled by the given amount. The default width and color of this pen's strokes are used.

Parameters:
scaleLevel - The amount of the lines drawn by this pen are scaled in width.

Pen

public Pen(float width,
           java.awt.Color color,
           float scaleLevel)
Constructs a pen such that the lines drawn by it have the given width and color. Also, the width of the lines drawn by this pen is the width after being scaled by the given amount.

Parameters:
width - The width of the lines that are drawn by this pen.
color - The color of the lines that are drawn by this pen.
scaleLevel - The amount of the lines drawn by this pen are scaled in width.
